vlive.korean: 추석을... - 해외에서 체류를 해요? For Chuseok... - We're going abroad? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : TVXQ! X EATING SHOW - 동방신기의 같이먹어요!
해외에서 체류를 한 답니다. - 그렇습니다. He has his own way of speaking. - Yes. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : TVXQ! X EATING SHOW - 동방신기의 같이먹어요!
vlive.english: He has his own way of speaking. - Yes.

vlive.korean: 저희가 아마 추석 때는 해외에서 체류를 할 예정이어서... we're probably going abroad during the holidays... 듣기 View video V COOKIE : TVXQ! X EATING SHOW - 동방신기의 같이먹어요!
vlive.english: we're probably going abroad during the holidays...

vlive.korean: 그 사람들의 동의도 구해야죠. - 불법체류 아니에요? You have to receive their consent. - Isn't that an illegal stay? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] VIXX X LieV - 빅스의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: You have to receive their consent. - Isn't that an illegal stay?

vlive.korean: "1달이 넘었는데 해명도 없고 해외 체류중인 것 같다". "It's been a month but she doesn't say anything and went overseas". 듣기 View video 10PM : [10pm2 월] 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 A night's entertainment news
vlive.english: "It's been a month but she doesn't say anything and went overseas".

examples.korean: illegal immigrants / aliens 발음듣기 불법 이민자/불법 체류 외국인 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
They have been denied residence in this country. 발음듣기 그들은 이 나라에 체류[거주]하는 허가를 받지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They have been denied residence in this country. 발음

examples.korean: He took a job to finance his stay in Germany. 발음듣기 그는 독일 체류 비용을 대기 위해 취직을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He took a job to finance his stay in Germany. 발음

examples.korean: We don’t live here. We’re just visiting. 발음듣기 우리는 여기에 살지 않아요. 그냥 체류 중일[다니러 왔을] 뿐이에요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We don’t live here. We’re just visiting. 발음

examples.korean: His familiarity with the language helped him enjoy his stay. 발음듣기 그는 그 언어에 익숙해서 체류 동안 즐겁게 지내는 데 도움이 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His familiarity with the language helped him enjoy his stay. 발음
